mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TH_RESOURCE ( NODE_IP, UPDATE_TIME, CPU_USAGE, MEM_USAGE, DISK_USAGE, NET_RECEIVE, NET_SEND, NET_RECEIVE_VARIANCE, NET_SEND_VARIANCE, IO_WAIT, LOAD_AVG ) VALUES ( #{ip}, #{datetime}, #{cpu_usage}, #{ram_usage}, #{disk_usage}, #{network_receive}, #{network_send}, #{network_receive_variance}, #{network_send_variance}, #{iowait}, #{load_avg} );
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM TH_RESOURCE WHERE NODE_IP = #{serverIp} AND UPDATE_TIME = ( SELECT MAX(UPDATE_TIME) FROM TH_RESOURCE WHERE NODE_IP = #{serverIp} );
